headline: Halliburton to support NEP’s CCS project in UK
summary: The company is set to deliver completions and downhole monitoring services.

raw.summary: The company is set to deliver completions and downhole monitoring services.

headline: Northern Q2 Earnings Beat Estimates, Revenues Increase Y/Y
summary: NOG expects total production of 130,000-133,000 barrels of oil equivalent per day, with oil production in the range of 74,000-76,000 barrels per day for 2025.

raw.headline: Northern Q2 Earnings Beat Estimates, Revenues Increase Y/Y
raw.summary: NOG expects total production of 130,000-133,000 barrels of oil equivalent per day, with oil production in the range of 74,000-76,000 barrels per day for 2025.

headline: Northern Endurance Partnership Awards Halliburton Contract for Carbon Capture and Storage Monitoring
summary: HOUSTON, August 05, 2025--Halliburton (NYSE: HAL) today announced a contract award to provide completions and downhole monitoring services for the Northern Endurance Partnership (NEP) carbon capture and storage (CCS) system in northeast England’s East Coast Cluster (ECC).
